channel.title: H2 on Ambiguous Implicits - Paul Lysak's blog about programming

item.title: H2 LIMIT and OFFSET
item.description: Funny thing - H2 in PostgreSQL compatibility mode requires that OFFSET should go strictly after LIMIT (like LIMIT 25 OFFSET 50). Otherwise it can't parse the query: error in SQL statement "SELECT .......... OFFSET 0 LIMIT[*] 25 "; expected "[, ::, *, /, %, +, -, ||, ~, !~, NOT, LIKE, REGEXP, IS, IN, BETWEEN, AND, OR, ROW, ROWS"
